Function template extent

boost::histogram::axis::traits::extent — Returns axis size plus any extra bins for under- and overflow.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/histogram/axis/traits.hpp>


template<typename Axis> index_type extent(const Axis & axis);

Description

Parameters:

axis

any axis instance
